name: JERBS
description:
This is a game about Oranges defending their border from Chilies. Developed and programed by me. With art help from my brother. Hope you enjoy it!

Instructions

  1. Move around using WASD or arrow keys.
  2. Use scroll wheel to scroll through weapons.
  3. You lose jerbs when chilies walk through the border. You lose hen you lose all your jerbs.
  4. Earn money by killing chilies.
  5. Open the shop by hovering over the money symbol at the bottom left corner.
  6. Hold space to manually-aim with mouse.
  7. Earn extra cash at the end of rounds with money crates.
  8. Gain jerbs at the end of rounds with jerb crates.

Tips

  • Sell placed items by dragging them behind the border.
  • You can drag and drop reinforcements in between rounds.
  • Ordering crate-types during rounds will cause them to spawn behind the border. They have to be dragged into the battle grounds after the round ends. 
  • Soldiers spawn at a random wall door during rounds.
  • Rotate walls by pressing space.
